fib_statement.data: Fill in the blanks with the correct key aspects of Solar Energy.

fib_questions.data:
The _____ process converts sunlight to DC, then to AC for various uses.
Solar energy helps lower maintenance _____ costs.
Solar energy powers _____, businesses, and satellites efficiently.
Solar energy reduces emissions and pollution, combating _____.
